{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Askey |model=TCG310 |revision=-J |fcc_date=10/03/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=H8NTCG310 |ic_id=1353A-TCG310 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3390;BCM3390ZKFSBG, TA1620 P20, 594131-85 N3 W; |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF2G18AC-XKI |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646E-BCNB |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1636 P30, 622548-21 3; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1702 P30, 216-13 3;; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85310-11;SKY11, 85310, 629EM;4; |flags=DOCSIS 3.1, NitroQAM, 256QAM, VHT160, ZigBee, Bluetooth, MU-MIMO, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user=user |default_pass=user |oui=00:10:18, 1C:B0:44, B4:EE:B4 |oui_eth=00:90:00, 1C:B0:44, B4:EE:B4 }}
:• '''2200''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (1024QAM), :• '''600''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for 2.4GHz 802.11n (256QAM) = '''''2800 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|DOCSIS 3.1 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.askey.com.tw/cablemodem_TCG310-J.html}} {{•}} [http://www.askey.com.tw/pdf/TCG310-J.pdf Datasheet] :''Embedded Media Terminal Adapter (EMTA)'' :''Zigbee, BT and 802.11ac Dual-Band Concurrent'' "Zero wait DFS and DSP-based Spectrum capture" * DOCSIS 3.1 dual 192Mhz downstream OFDM plus 32 SC-QAM channels * DOCSIS 3.1 dual 96Mhz upstream OFDM plus 8 SC-WAM channels{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }} This device was originally submitted to the FCC on 05/09/2017. :On 08/16/2017, Askey submitted a [https://fccid.io/H8NTCG310/Letter/Dismissal-Letter-3512001 Dismissal Letter] to request :that this FCC grant be dismissed with the message below. The device was then re-submitted on 10/03/2017. :"We would like FCC to dismiss the grant of this FCC ID ASAP, :due to device Hardware and Software design will be changed, :to improve the WiFi throughput and performance." ===See also=== :[[Askey]] • [http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless.html Wireless] • [http://www.askey.com.tw/broadband.html Gateways] *[[Askey RT5010W]] - ''802.11ax High Performance WiFi Router'' *[[Askey RT4230W]] - ''Puma WiFi Router'' (Wave 2 4x4) *[[Askey RT4220W]] - ''Cube Router'' (802.11ac 2x2) *[[Askey RTF3505VW-GV]] - ''GPON Home Gateway'' *[[Askey RTF8105VW]] - ''GPON Home Gateway'' *[[Askey RTV7736VW]] - ''VDSL Home Gateway'' *[[Askey RTV1928VW]] - ''High Performance Internet Box'' *[[Askey STI9040]] - MoCA WiFi Router :[http://www.askey.com.tw/tv.html Set-Top Boxes & Cable Modems] *[[Askey STI6130]] - UHD Android TV Dongle *[[Askey STI6030]] - Netﬂix UHD Android TV Box *[[Askey STI1130]] (H.265 HEVC) - HD HEVC IP STB *[[Askey STI1120]] (H.264) - HD HEVC IP STB *[[Askey STC8030]] - HD DVB-S2/T2/C PVR STB *[[Askey STC2110]] - D3.1 Cable Gateway/UHD STB *[[Askey STS2060]] - UHD IPTV/DVB Android TV STB :Cable Modems *[[Askey TCG310]] (-J) - D3.1 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem *[[Askey TCG300]] - D3.0 24x8 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem *[[Askey TCG220]] - D3.0 8x4 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem *[[Askey TCG220-x]] - D3.0 16x4 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem *[[Askey TCG220-d]] - D3.0 8x4 Data Cable Modem __NOTOC__
